name: Amir Saidi
text: They deserve five stars for their service, and food. :)

name: daniel lewis
text: Yes yes yes!!!!! Visiting my brother while in college i went to this little food truck on the side of the road and i has to say these cheesy fries are the BEST FRIES EVER!!! They look so simple but I'm craving them all the way from Florida !!! I highly recommend if you're in the area!!

name: Samantha Taylor
text:
I order the Quick GrillTM in October 2020 for $39.99 shows shipped and I have never received. I have email this company 6times and NO RESPONSE at time. This is FRAUD and I am very displeased. I want my merchandise or to be REFUNDED my $39.99 ASAP !!!!!!

DDO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY. THEY ARE JUST TAKING PEOPLES MONEY AND NOT DELIVERING THEIR MERCHANDISE. THIS IS RIDICULOUS!!!!😡😡😡😡

name: William Stewart
text: Lives up to the hype. The kabob is great but you can never go wrong with the messy fries.

name: Hesham Binmahfooz
text: Great food. Fast service. Very nice staff. Clean place to sit and eat. Best spot in T town by far. Get the messy fries, with ranch.

name: Mohammad S
text: The best night restaurant ever. They have a good small menu and the guy how works there he is so respectful and nice with everyone. Try the cheese fries you will not regret and the chicken wrap as well.

name: Preston
text: Truly one of the best hidden gems in all of Tuscaloosa. I cannot praise this place enough. From the lamb kabob wraps to the messy fries the food is amazing, unbelievably quick and I love the very tight ownership they run on the place. I absolutely love what they're doing and if you haven't tried it you're missing out.

name: Kevin O'Neill
text: This is a game day GO TO!! All the bars and restaurants are filled up these guys are quick and easy! Walk across the street and get a few to-go beers and you have a tremendous pre-game snack!! Roll Tide!

name: Misty Williams
text: Highly disappointed. Drove 45 minutes to get my usual and they were out of chicken. I definitely won't be going again.

name: ecj091999
text: Kicked out of rounders? Quick Grill. Not getting laid? Quick Grill. Struggling with credit card debt? Quick Grill.

name: Sam Sam
text: Nice food and good people

name: Lizzy Liz
text: I got the lamb with Pita it is good but if I'm going to pay 9.00 I think the lamb swer should be two and it should be two pita bread! Otherwise than that it is awesome !

name: somiddho bosu
text: Delicious Philly fries. Good option for drunken breakfast at wee hours.

name: Greg Evans
text: I don't know why all these bad reviews. If you're drunk from across the street  and you eat a bucket of anything, you're not going to feel good the next day. Grow up, frat boys. I had the lamb kabob, which is on thick soft pita and it was f'g awesome. Big chunks of lamb, not the usual sliced gyro off the roll. I will get one of these whenever I'm in town...

name: Garrett Bell
text: BEWARE: toxic deliciousness! Get the messy fries and you will love yourself while eating them, and hate yourself when your done. Highly recommend to anyone who can digest a cheap styrofoam bucket of diaria causing deliciousness.

text: Excellent Food! Open late night.

name: Coty Hall
text: This location is fairly new, the major lines have died down. I went around 11:30am and there were only a handful of cars in the drive thru. Order accuracy was mostly good. They didn't give me pickles on the sandwich like I asked but they also forgot the dipping sauce I asked for. Ordered a spicy chicken sandwich and an 8 piece nugget combo. Food was good, only slightly room temp. I will be back ofcourse.

name: Why Certainly
text: I agree with the previous reviewer. They need more quality control. Got home and realized they had not given me the food portion of a whole combo meal. Meanwhile the employees had time to talk amongst themselves and have a good ole’ time while serving customers. You guys have got to do a better job with making sure your customers receive all of the expensive food items they have paid for.

name: Alorah Hammond
text: The food taste good but with as many workers that they have in the building someone should double check bags before they go out. I work nearby and have gotten lunch here twice this week and haven’t received my French fries both times. Their frozen strawberry lemonade is DELICIOUS

name: Adriane Perkins
text: Just left this location and waited in drive thru for almost 30 minutes to get home to an old sandwich, hard bread and fresh fries.. All I can say is wow and this store just opened up just a few weeks ago.

name: lewis holmes
text: This Popeyes have bad service at the drive thru. Also,  workers don’t know how to check the receipt and properly give the customer their food. I didn’t receive my chicken sandwich.

name: Demetrius Mills
text: The new EastChase location is awsome.  Very friendly and great customer service.  I do love me some red beans and rice and a few other things on the menu.  Lol.  Or a lot of things on the menu.

name: John James
text: There food is getting greasier, and you have to ask for condiments now....

name: A.E. H. Washington
text: Very poor service because I have been setting here at the drive through for, forever!!!!

name: Ray Ray
text: Would like to file an official complaint the store closed at 9:30 and on their door it states close at 11:00. They have over 6 cars to.pull in and they just advised them that they were close. I'm going to make sure that i get in touch with a higher up because this comes just open and already their service is disappointing. I will report this to whoever this needs to go to until there is improvement. This was on 9/5.

name: Robett Robinson
text: The food was good, just not hot. The take out had a wait but expected

name: Bunky Mercado
text: EXCELLENT food and service at a GREAT price!

name: Joseph Herr
text: This place is CLOSED permanently I think

name: Amanda Per
text: I would give this place 0 stars if I could! Took them exactly 24 minutes to even get my food on the grill and there was only 2 other people that had ordered before me. Got my plate 32 minutes after I ordered. Food might be hot but other than that it takes FOREVER to get your food even if you're the only person in here. Dont plan on coming here if you're in a rush.

name: Felix Diaz
text:
GREAT TIMES DESERVE GREAT FOOD AMERICAN DELI❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Made to Order and fresh is our signature
Come over guys try us we are going to come back you again because every guest is very special to us 🙏🏼

People there are nice! Food is prepared fresh and you can see it being prepared. The shrimp fried rice and burgers with wings are so good 😋

name: David Schoonover
text: Restaurant smelled unpleasant despite appearing to be fairly new.  Took two bites of fried rice and threw away. Never again.

name: Caitlyn Stephenson
text: Like most places in or around Montgomery the service is terrible. The Cashier is so rude its almost comical, but yet they have a tip jar on the counter. The drink and dining area are dirty  and the food is mediocre at best.

name: Robert Nicholson (Rob)
text: Had Philly and wings. Both were really good. Even the people waiting on s was great!! Defiantly going back..

name: Miranda milner
text: I’ve been to this location three times in the last week or so. Each time, the staff has been incredibly rude. I phoned in an order on the second visit and the girl on the phone argued with me about my order.. she then handed the phone off to someone else saying “somebody else deal with this”.. I’m not sure where the management is (if there even is any) but, they will not last if they continue to have such poor customer service. The food is hit or miss at the Wetumpka location. I never, ever, have this problem with the Burbank location in Montgomery. There’s no need to be as rude and disrespectful as this staff is.

name: Valerie Johnson
text: I ordered the philly and wing combo and got home and realized they did not put the wings in my box after I waited 40 minutes for my food. The service was horrible and the cashier was very rude. Will not be going back.

name: Richard Edwards
text: Since they're under new management, the food and service is a lot better

name: william jeon
text: The food tastes really good here.

name: Melanie Good
text: Wouldn't know. Everytime we try to come here in the evening, they're closed, even though they are supposedly open till 9.

name: Phillip Puckett
text: Great food and fast service get your money worth

name: Michael King
text: The fact that they call this place a deli is criminal misrepresentation. The only deli-like item on the menu is the "Ruben" sandwich, and they can't seem to understand the concept, much less the execution. They dry grilled the meat and then had to go out and buy the saurkraut. If I wasn't really hungry, and hadn't already paid, I would have cancelled my order and walked.

name: C Ray Marilu S Beasley
text: Good deli food. Philly steak was excellent.

name: Jennifer Easterwood
text: Philly steak sandwich is awesome,small menu

name: Brigette Boykin
text: Got here 5 minutes ago which is 4:55pm on a Sunday and was told by employees that they were closed, yet there werer people sitting in the restaurant eating...I'm confused

name: Charlie Luckie
text: Let me start with, IM ADDICTED TO AMERICAN DELI! But I have recently moved from Montgomery to Wetumpka. Within the last week I have ordered from the Wetumpka location three times and all three times were HORRIBLE. Staff is NOT friendly. NONE OF THEM. They laugh at you when you have a complaint or need. I call on advance so there is no wait. But yet I still end up waiting 30 mins for my food . Doesn't matter what time of day it is. There never seems to be a leader of any sort on duty. They argued with me about my order on the 2nd time. I order the same thing EVERY SINGLE DAY. I just wish they would fix the staff or training process to make things more enjoyable.  Sincerely, American Deli addict

name: Samantha Harris
text: I waited 30 minutes for food then manager came out and said couldnt give my money back and another manager came out a d agreed with me about waiting to long for our food. I wouldnt ever go back there. They afe very slow and rude. One girl thought it was funny when i waited so long for my food. Vwrh bad service

name: Ariel Jones
text: The staff is very friendly, and the food is always prepared freshly!

name: Tommy Hatcher
text: 4th day in a row I’ve tried calling and no one answers. I Walked in Walmart and watched them ignore the phone.

name: stacy Guary
text: Food is good workers are too slow

name: Kelly Ann
text: I ordered a Philly combo, just one, for me and my boyfriend to split. We waited over 30 minutes for this one meal, while other people who got there after us were receiving their meals, and a couple even had the same thing. Awful service. Will not be going back.

name: Paris Davis-Lawson
text: Very fast service and the workers are nice

name: Tammy “POSSUM” Bullock
text: I love the chicken wings

name: Antonio Shelton
text: Love the wings

text: I like the food and the service

text:
Chicken was very good.
...But it's Troy.

Prices are already too high.

name: Tammy Thomas
text: Good Food!

name: Chiquita Wright
text: I have only ordered from here twice but my mother-in-law loves the fish and fries. I have enjoyed my food both times. I look forward to trying other foods from here.

name: Ruth Toles
text: Totally good enjoyed my whole catfish which I had a taste for several days.

name: Janelle Carter
text: Very good... Worth the money

name: Antonio Dawson
text: Man this is place to go and get fresh hit food on point every time I go love it

name: Teresa Carter
text: The wings (sweet and tangy) were the best vs the honey bbq and the burger was delicious!!!

name: Patricia Tesch
text: Good chicken wings!!

name: John Dutch
text: Visited this place for the 1st time. Never new it existed until I did a google search for a burger.  This restaurant is a hidden gem. I will make it a constant for my cheese burger fix. Great wings also.

name: Nikki Billingsley
text: Great food and friendly staff!!

name: debra drinkard
text: This was the best burger that I have found in Lafayette good going guys it was great thank you!

name: Rosa Holloway
text: Great service and great food...

name: Denise Coleman
text: They have real good food

name: Tolandra Bledsoe
text: The best hotwings and fried okra I've ever had

name: Regina Miller
text: Called order in 25 mins. before arriving. Upon arrival wait time changed twice. Food was OVER COOKED.

name: heather carnley
text: Omg hamburgers and lemon pepper fries off the chain thanks ladies it was jumpin

name: david floyd
text: Locally owned family friendly awesome food

text: Every time I come down here, I get their wings!! The best!!😍😍

text: Delicious food here . love it !!!!

name: Adrian Heard
text: Good eating!

name: Ryleigh Queen
text: They're just ok

name: Skylar.W Hardnett
text: Great food

name: Jivar Ware
text: Great food

name: Agsi Wesa
text: Went here with the wife for my birthday lunch.  Upon entering the restaurant we noticed several of the tables had not been bussed and the bathrooms were horrible, had not been cleaned I would say for more than a hour.  Anyway we placed our order and sat down at the cleanest table we could find to enjoy lovely looking meal.  That is all I can honestly say about this meal, it looked lovely but that is where it stopped.  My chicken breast was not cooked completely, the mashed potatoes and gravy had a very funny taste to them and the slaw tasted like it was sour.  We asked to speak with a manager to register a complaint but was told by one of the employees they were on break and unavailable.  With that my wife and I left without finishing our meal.  Later  that evening I got somewhat sick from the meal as I am now sure the food was tainted and not prepared properly.  I talked with several of my friends about this restaurant and they informed me they had experienced the same treatment and attitude when trying to register a compliant with the manager.  I would not go back to this restaurant nor would I recommend it unless you are a fan of food poisoning!

name: Gachaclub Hannah
text: They don't even deserve 1 star!! This place is always dirty and nasty I've even got food poisoning once here!! I will never eat here again, they need to fire all the rude managers and higher ppl that know what they are doing and don't stand outside getting high!!

name: Dan Cantrell
text: Terrible!!   Do not go there!!  We ordered our food, then found a table and had to get cleaning stuff and wipe it off, their bathrooms and eating area is disgusting, after 30 minutes of waiting for our food I got a refund and left..  Most disgusting place I've ever been in and absolutely terrible service.  Place needs bulldozed...

name: Dewight Watkins
text: The food was great but the wait was not

name: Russ Luepnitz
text: Very very slow service but the manager was understaffed. The KFC was poor to fair and the taco bell food was good.

name: John Clardy
text: Worse kfc ive ever been to

name: David Weston
text:
Have TRIED to eat at this place because of convience.

Cant do it anymore!!!!

Nasty greasy floors
Almost fell down in the bathroom

Have had the wrong order more times than I can count.

Mashed potatoes with no gravy

No slaw 3 times... Complained after the 1st one and the manager gave us a free meal. "Didnt get slaw" on the ticket and we still didnt get it. Forget the freebie we didnt want that. Went back in the next day and told the same manager what happened. Told her we didnt come in for a freebie just out order and didnt get it again!!!!!!!!
I'm done with this place.

They own the one in Hamilton and they arent any better.

Wont accept without 1 star.

Nothing about this place deserves a star

0 star rating

name: Lisa Moyer
text: It was Very Crowed due to it being Mother's Day Food was delicious..

name: Hollie Finch
text: They ALWAYS mess up my order. The service is usually bad.

name: Bobbie Base
text: Have you heard about KFC-Kentucky Fried Chicken in Fayette, Alabama? Well, I have some very disturbing news for you! A very dedicated employee of 16 years was fired from KFC in Fayette, AL while she was in the ER at Fayette Hospital with a stomach virus! There was even a picture posted of this very nice, hard working lady while she was hooked up to IV's. Guess what happened! She was fired!!! Was she on probation or something?>No! Did she have a history of being absent?>No! Sixteen years at a fast food restaurant is a long time. During that faithful 16 yrs., this lady broke her elbow at work. Just a one time thing and what happened?>Her pay was cut! Was the accident her fault?>No! This lady has been unfairly fired, without cause or reason. The owner: Steve Dean didn't stand up and do it himself, no, he took her off schedule and had the Manager do the firing. Trying to save himself for any fault which there is plenty of fault! Surely, there is someone over him (I should have said "The Suppose to be Owner"), or someone who can look into this and yes there is, Steve Dean's father, Wiley Dean, the Owner of KFC in Haleyville, AL. Those that do not know this lady are probably thinking, "oh, she must have done something", "she must have been laying out a lot", "she must just be trying to get money out of them", "she had to be doing something wrong". Well, if you are thinking any of those things, you are wrong on all of them! The only thing she did, was try to get herself well and not give the virus to anyone at work and any of the customers. Would you like to have someone with a virus handling your food or taking your money and giving your change back? So, what can this lady do? Nothing without the help from you, the public. Word of mouth speaks volumes, especially with facebook! Please, if you think this lady has been wronged, and she has, please, Post It on facebook! You don't have to live in Fayette, AL to post it, for that matter, you don't have to live in AL, all you have to be is concerned and kind enough to acknowledge someone who has been unfairly mistreated. Please, please post your feelings about this. I am not even asking you not to eat there anymore. I just want the entire public to know what kind of person is running the KFC in Fayette, AL and hopefully get this lady some satisfaction by letting the public know and the KFC to see that it is known. She did not ask me to do this. I am doing it because it is not fair, I would miss her friendly face if I were to ever go there again, which I will not and I would hate for this to happen to me or anyone in my family or friends. Thank you.

name: Donna Westbrook
text: It was nasty the Male employees also looked nasty

name: Lynn Vick
text: Stood in line for 20 minutes, never did get within arms reach of ordering. Way to slow.

name: Casey Moore
text: It took 25 mins to get my food. The order was completely wrong and the staff was extremely rude. When I called to tell them I was bringing the food back 1/2 hour before closing they refused to answer the phone.

name: Ralph Foster
text: Never has food after 7:00 p.m..  It's like they just stop cooking hoping people will go away cause it takes so long to cook. But the food is good when you can get some of it

name: sidney Minnifield
text: Just nothing good to say

name: L Atchison
text:
Restaurant is semi clean, restrooms were dirty and not maintained. Business licenses and health codes were hidden behind the drink machines out of view of the consumers. The employee cleaning tables never touched the cleaning cloth to the table, but instead brushed debris to the floor from the seat with her shoe. The same gloves worn by the cashier handled my cash, food order, drink cup, ice machine, register, and the cleaning rag.
When I placed my order for dine in service, I was asked what I wanted to drink. I told the cashier,  but was never handed a cup. So I assumed it would come out with the meal. 10 minutes later my meal comes out. No drink. I ask about my drink. CRICKETS!!! I ask again a bit louder since it's a bit noisy in the place with only myself and one other customer there. The cashier fills my drink and slams it on my table with an attitude. At this point I am regretting leaving a $4 tip in advance of services rendered.
After that incident I could hear the employees talking down about me behind the counter.
On another note: I am a photo reactive epileptic. There is a color changing sign in this eatery, that I was told by the worker to just ignore, in the entryway that triggered my photo reactive seizure senses. If you have any family that is photo reactive. You may want to avoid this place.

name: Michael Gerrits
text: Great place for lunch or dinner, the chicken tenders and chicken tender sliders are all delicious, and they have different sides including fries and Mac and cheese that you can get, and the fries are especially delicious. Make sure you get the Fry'd sauce as at least one of your two dipping sauces you get, and get the lemonade, it's delicious. I highly recommend you stop in and give them a try, you wont be disappointed.

name: Shane P
text: Great food, friendly staff, and quick service. Your food will be hot, and your food will be good. Many signature sauces to choose from. The mac and cheese and sliders are a must. If you have room after the generous portions, don’t forget the fried Oreos for dessert. This place is a must if you live in Chelsea or are just passing through.

name: Stephenie Samudio
text: Amazing chicken salad, Mac & cheese and broccoli salad and these are the only three items I've had a chance to try so far. Great, friendly service in a clean establishment. I can't wait to go back and try more items.

name: Joshua Holtzclaw
text: Good experience picking up my family size tender meal. Chicken was fried well and their sauces are delicious. Mac n cheese was really good. Fries are excellent. Kids loved it. I'll definitely order here again soon.

name: Larry Smith
text: Good was hot and good but not excellent.  Service was good and the place was very clean.  Nice to have this type of eatery in Chelsea.

name: Jeff king
text: Fries are good. The fingers are bland you have to use a sauce. The buffalo sauce was tasty not hot.

name: Kyle Lieberman
text:
Pretty good chicken.  Service was fast which was impressive for being brand new.
I give 4 stars because I ordered a side of fries and side of onion rings and they were about $7 each. It’s not like there were a ton of fries/onion rings in my order- it should have been 1/2 the price.
Other than that, it was good.
I’ll be back.

name: Maddie Gibson
text: It is actually really great! My only problem is just that the dream has fries are cold sometimes. I do have to say my favorite thing is the BBQ sauce. I highly suggest it on sliders.

name: al bishop
text: This place is excellent!!! The food is way above fast-food quality. The dipping sauces are fantastic, and the lemonade rivals Toomer’s Corner’s. Their sliders come on Hawaiian rolls. Need I say more?

name: Natalie Abercrombie
text: My family loves this place! So happy with the friendly service and delicious food!

name: Gunnar Pollard
text: As far as the food goes, there is more to be desired. You can probably find similar chicken fingers in the frozen section of any grocery store. The biggest issue I have though is with the service itself. Unlike other “fast food” restaurants, the employees don’t seem to be on any kind of timer. Combine that with them all being teenagers with an attitude. I just don’t understand the logic in the drive thru line. I had one meal (5 pc tenders) and the car in front of us had a 40 pc family meal. What did they do? They let the car with the large amount of food sit at the window while the line continued to wrap the building. Anyone should know that they should pull the car with the large order up and serve people with smaller amounts of food while preparing the large order. We want to like this place, but honestly it’s kind of ehh…..

name: J. Smith
text: Great food, fast service. The chicken salad, broccoli salad and fried oreos are amazing. My kids love the chicken fingers and fries. Very family friendly.

name: Joann Shatara
text: We ate there the other night ,the food was terrific.  Wonderful service. Great atmosphere. Highly recommended it.We will definitely be back.

name: Prime MGM
text: Amazing food! Super fast service. Best chicken salad EVER!

name: William Gilley
text: Excellent chicken and very friendly staff. Service was fast and the sauces are all terrific. Will definitely be coming back soon.

name: Dennis Dilly
text: Got chicken tenders tonight and they were terrible. They were real skinny little tenders, they were hard and had no taste. This was my one and only visit. Will not go back..

name: Kris Findlay
text: Great food at a fair price!

name: Jared Lyvers
text: Personal opinion here, but not a fan of the coleslaw or not having a real biscuit. But the chicken was good!

name: Travis Grandy
text: The food was a thoughtful display of bold flavors and freshness that delicately tingle the taste buds in a whole new way . The tenders are moist like a run through the splash pad on a mid summers day and the sauces keep you Dippin all the way to flavor town. Retire your hunger after a hard days work and let Chicken Fryd sooth you with satiating flavor thats sure To keep you coming back.

name: Keith Britt
text: This local Chelsea, Alabama restaurant, in what was once a WHATABURGER, is unique and special in so many ways!  There is no mistaking the building construction of the iconic WHATABURGER "A" but that is where the similarities end.  The building, outside and in, had been beautifully changed and redecorated to have it's own look and feel just as the food it offers.  This is not another "chain" fast food offering.  Yes, as the name suggests, chicken is the basis of it's offerings but the variations are almost endless especially when you factor in the many (8) different dipping sauces all created in house by their culinary trained, locally raised and well loved manager.  The side choices are numerous and varied to meet every taste mood.  We had the fresh made lemonade and it was refreshingly different and delicious. In future visits I will try their sliders, sandwiches and salads but for my first visit it was the tenders with onion rings served with their own sweet slaw all of which were fantastic!  I complement the owners and staff on creating a new twist on an old staple in our American fare.  The results are refreshing, different, enjoyable and welcome!  Long live CHICKEN FRY'D!

name: Kristen Gillaspie
text: Just okay… fries were cold and soggy. Chicken was hot but breading was falling off. Also my drink had a bug in it. I only realized after it was all gone. All teenagers working so I guess you can’t except too much.

name: Demetrius Riley
text: I came to your resturant yesterday for the first time.the chicken & fries was cold and hard. for just opening up thats not a good way to start out. Hopefully no one else will have this problem. GOOD LUCK!!!

name: Dubiel
text: There are so many chicken places to choose from around here and this place hands down knocks them all out of the park! Everything here is AMAZING!

name: Robert Crist
text: Great,,try it you'll like it.

name: Margaret Contreras
text: Great food anf great service! Thanks for the VIP treatment!

name: Mary Crist
text: Good food, good portions.

name: Horace Kelly
text: Wasn't impressed not many options to choose from. A little pricey for the amount of the sides offered.

name: Casey Britt
text: Love it! Glad to have them in town!

name: lilgoogs83
text: This is an awesome place to eat!!

name: jesse armstrong
text: Sweet tea was terrible service was rude and snappy do not waste your time or money

text: Item was missing. Fries were greasy and unsalted. Won’t go back.

name: Gavin Graham
text: Great food and service

name: Jordan Boston
text: Sliders are awesome!

name: Vince Gray
text: Great food!

name: Jonathan Lin
text: Item was missing from the family meal that was ordered

name: Jinxey slay
text: Awesome!

text: The food is terrible and so is the service. Do not go here.

name: kathleen dubey Davis
text: I tried there lasagna today and it was amazing! Definite go to place for catering or even family dinners you can pick up and bring home! Excited to try the other casseroles and choices in the future!

name: Jennifer Susman
text: This place is insanely good.  I'm normally not one for "lunch cafes" but I truly enjoy coming here.  Try anything off of the Clark's Kitchen menu and you will be glad you did!  The food is delicious, the restaurant is clean, service is fabulous, internet is free- what more can I say?  Love it here.  I'll be back tomorrow...again!

name: Doris Lepoma
text: I had Seafood Gumbo, It was just perfect,,,Almost like the Gumbo my husband and my mother-in law makes. It was a welcome treat foe  both me and my son. Also  perfect day to have our lunch outside/sidewalk. The pansies are beautiful.

name: Tommy Evans
text: Walked in to a decent atmosphere, pleasant enough staff, but we waited for 40 minutes for two small orders. I got half of what was ordered, my girlfriend didn't even get hers. And we wound up getting a refund and leaving. Short staffed or no they could have warned us, we wasted an entire afternoon and got nothing for it. Don't eat here. It was just bad.

name: ImUrUncleDaddy
text: Good food, ok prices, fast service, great deserts, and even have take home meals. Take home meals are great being a college student because it's enough to feed me all week. Stop by at least once a week now.

name: Destiny L
text:
I am a long time customer of Camile's, not because of the food, but because it is right next door to campus. I sometimes like to sit and grab a bite between classes. The food is bit bland, but I have never had any problems with my order. One day I did and was treated horribly for the complaint. I ordered the Camile club with no mayo. When I received my sandwich, it had mayo. So, I calmly went back up and explained that I didn't want mayo. I was told it could be fixed.

While waiting on my sandwich, I noticed the staff watching me and speaking quietly, but I ignored it. 5 minutes later I was called back and when I went to check my sandwich again, I noticed the residue from mayo. It looked as if someone had wiped the mayo off and changed the bread. Again, calmly, I went back up (once again noticing the staff snickering) and asked to speak to the manager for a refund. Said-manager whose name I couldn't get, claimed she was there the whole time they "remade" my sandwich and it was fresh. I told her that couldn't be the case because it was now cold, it took her less time to make it than originally and I showed her a piece of lettuce that had mayo in it.

She then rudely asked me if I still had my receipt, which I did. I was given a refund, but I don't appreciate the way I was treated. If I'm paying for a meal, I expect it to made the way I requested it. I didn't ask them to make me a sandwich befitting God. I just didn't want mayo.  I am never stepping foot into that cafe again.

name: donrico browne
text: Love it friendly staff and the food was delicious  prices very affordable  definitely  would dine in again!!! Worth sharing

name: C M
text: Food was fast! I got a burger, which had melty cheese, great ground beef, and crisp lettuce and tomatoe. Also got a fruit cup that was fresh! My buddy got a poboy. It looked great, had normal sized shrimp for a restaurant that is not specifically seafood. Will be back. Prices a bit high, but again it's quality food, not fast food.

name: Wes Allday
text: Good food, great people, nice atmosphere for lunch.

name: Captain Redbeard
text: Food was decent but I expected more.  I ordered a turkey habanero sandwich but there was no spicy-ness at all.

name: Devin Brown
text: Awesome Food and great people! You can't beat this place.

name: Phil Forrest
text: Very delicious simple food. Lots of healthy options.

name: Jaye J
text: I had a great experience

name: William Matthew Reichert
text: Great casseroles

name: Carley Pekelder
text: No real silverware. :(

name: Lynne Rupert
text: Wings so good my family cannot get enough!  I love the staff at this place.  If you go once, they remember you every time.  Friendly, take time to talk to you.  Family owned and operated by the best staff I have ever seen at a Wings place.

name: staff aduster
text: This is my 1st visit but definitely will not be my last. Ordered naked wings And loaded fries. This is a family business operated by LB his wife and his daughter's. They take great pride in the quality of their food. If you've got a craving for wings this is definitely worth the trip from wherever you happen to be.

name: Scottie Thibodaux
text: Best wing place I've been to in a long time, the atmosphere is so relaxing and makes you feel welcome and almost at home I would recommend this place to anyone please go enjoy this place

name: Drew Hall
text:
Wings so good...

I ordered 10....then had to order 10 more.

Will gladly drive up here just to eat them again. Best wings in MOBILE.

name: Heather Easterling
text: Totally worth going too! Fresh, hot food and friendly staff.

name: sonya johnson
text: This is the best wings place in Mobile Alabama. I definitely will be going back.

name: Glenda Turnbow
text: The wings are delicious,  nice and clean atmosphere.  Staff  is  super friendly

name: Kyndal Young
text: Absolutely amazing. I've told a few people just how good thw chicken and okra was. I will be back!

name: Joe Durham
text: This was my third time here and I have enjoyed each time I've been there i truly love how they treat me as family I have not had not one bad experience here looking forward to my next visit😊😊😊😊

name: Dustin Mouret
text: Some of the best wings I’ve had in the Mobile area. Highly recommend.

name: travis pridgen
text: Wings were good but very small!

name: Patrick Kichler
text: Very friendly staff and great wings

name: william smith
text:
Try the philly cheesesteak sandwich.
Your welcome

name: Derrick Austin
text: Food is great

name: Colby Corley
text: I called to make sure the restaurant was still open at 10:20pm. One person said they closed in 40 minutes while another got on a different line and said they closed at 10 repeatedly and then both hung up. I was only 1 min from the restaurant so I stopped by. They were still open. I order my food and then am told there would be a wait for the food to cook. I'm patient and say that's fine and pull around to curbside pickup as instructed. 30 minutes go by so I call back in because they are closing in 8 minutes. They admitted to "forgetting" they had asked me to pull up... I'm the only vehicle in the parking lot that isn't an employee and have been for 20 min.... how do you not know I've been here for 30 minutes!? I feel that this was done on purpose! They were respectful as they admitted the wrong. This is the only reason I'm not putting 1 star. I didn't receive my food until 10:01... That is 38 minutes after I ordered!

name: Dawn Lee
text: Love that they are so personable. Always amazing service.

name: Jason Cannon
text: Man I love me some Popeyes chicken, but this new store is the worst I've ever seen. They're consistently out of spicy chicken and the regular is trash. I haven't received biscuits on any of my door dash orders. I gave them 5 chances before I wrote a review but I won't be going back.

name: Leviticus Waters
text: OMG THE CHICKEN WAS FRESH TASTY AND THE STAFF WAS GREAT.

name: Chris Moore
text: I cant leave 0 stars so this will have to do. Fries were stale and coated in grease with no flavor,  didn't get spicy chicken as asked, and left out sauce. Probably a personal problem but the food made me sick and the taste of the grease was too strong. The sweet tea was probably the best thing I got from there besides service at the window. Lady who took my order sounded rude and still managed to get my order wrong after I repeated myself several times. Dining anywhere including hell would be better.

name: Marina gardner
text: We always try a place a couple of times just to give a business a chance and this is the third and last time we will go to this location.  Slow and always leaving things out of our order.

name: Nikki Rosario
text: Being this just recently opened up near my house, we were so excited. We have gone here 4 times and each time was not the best experience. First time was on opening day, other than the fact that we waited in line for a very long time which naturally we expected, our order was fine. Second time, I ordered a 4 piece chicken, and ended up with an 8 piece. No utensils, no sauce. Third time,  order was completely screwed up, again, no utensils or napkins. Fourth time, order was messed up again and got a diet coke instead of a regular coke (disgusting). Come on Popeyes, at some point you need to get it together or you're going to lose business. We will still keep going because we love Popeyes, but we are almost at our wits end with this place.

name: Tori Tyson
text: Have gone to this location three times and each time they mess up the order rather it’s not counting 8 pieces of chicken in the 8 piece.... or just ordering a Dr Pepper and getting a sweet tea. Read the tickets, pay attention and do the job correctly 🙄

name: Zack
text: I want my sauce. I paid for it. For real, if you're going to charge for it, put it in the bag. That isn't difficult.

name: Daniel Walton
text: I came thru drive thru,and placed a order   And it wasn't correct but when I came back and came inside the shift manager Epiphany smiled at me and I couldnt even be mad anymore she fixed my whole order over and was sooooo sweet  and nice.

name: That Girl Right There
text: The food was amazing! The service was fast and the staff was friendly and polite!

name: Vicki Rayburn
text: Was in drive-thru. Waited for sevaral minutes only 2 cars in front of me. Went to exit and the first car that had ordered was still at window.

name: Susan Miller
text: Went last weekend it was great. Went this weekend not so good. Chicken was way over cooked . Come on popeyes get it together.

name: Kay
text: Customer service is very good. The food is very good.

name: Carla Talley
text: Chicken cooked too hard  ordered a 11 piece didn't get no wings

name: Danielle Hopkins
text: Long wait, didn’t put ice in our drinks, chicken sandwich was so overdone it was inedible. Should have put a Chik-fil-a here. We won’t be back.

name: abdiel acevedo
text: Chicken was burn and hard like is been cooked 4 hours ago. Drinks tasted like water.

name: John Free
text: Just bad service ordered  Mac &cheese  I get to the window they said it was not ready yet should  have told me that at the window over priced

name: benny gray
text: False advertising slow service worker's playing food was cold

name: Amanda Rippy
text: Went on 5/25/21 and the manager was so rude and disrespectful. So loud while she was being rude that my mom on the other end of the restaurant heard her. Probably never returning to this location as long as she’s there.

name: Rufus Berdeaux
text: Long line and I ordered the ten piece tenders and got regular ten piece chicken bummer if didn't live so far away I would go back.

name: Greg Harkins
text: Clean facility and a friendly staff.

name: TMoore Leonard
text: Worst customer service ever!!!

name: Kim Reid
text: We go here everytime to get gas and there fresh food. The last time we went it was around 6pm and they were out of chicken tenders and BBQ and potato logs. That's what we get every time at that time of day but for some reason they were out this time. They weren't busy so I don't know why. 😕

name: Leslie Cooper
text: Chicken Tenders are A.M.A.Z.I.N.G!!!! Great place to go in a hurry, even better place to work at!!! Miss working there!

name: Mountain Man Williams
text: Employees are always helpful and im a regular so its nice to walk in and they are willing to talk and cut up with me. Makes my day so much better.

name: B Little
text: Great store,great company and owners are super nice.

name: James “XDMAN” Nicholas
text:
Yard Birds Chicken Company keeps getting better and better. They changed the menu yesterday and added cheese grits and bottomless Chicken & waffles everyday! I love chicken and waffles, but the portion was big enough that I could only eat one waffle, crispy fried breast and wing. To the owner you are a man of your word when you said you would fix the problems. We have been back a 4th and 5th time and every thing was fantastic!

2nd visit maybe I just have bad luck, Stood at the door for several minutes with my wife. They were not busy and we even asked an employee if we could just sit. Someone will be with you. I want to like this place but....... a simple hey we see you would help. I would actually rate it lower but the fried chicken is good and that got them an extra star. 1st visit Ate lunch at Yard Birds Chicken Company. Today was the grand opening so I will forgive them for forgetting the jalapeño cornbread then giving me biscuits and having to ask for ranch multiple times. The chicken was excellent, They use a crumbly crust almost like you use on fried green tomatoes. And It almost seems like they smoke the chicken first then batter and fry. It was tasty and next time I will have to have the hot. Now for the bad the corn bread was cold, not just room temp but cold. If it was warm then man it would have been great. As a suggestion please please add a honey butter with the warm cornbread or biscuits and it would be perfection.

name: Chastity Webb
text: Went on a Tuesday around lunch. It wasn’t busy as there were only about 4 other tables. Waitress was nice but service was slow. Menu advertises steak fries, we received potato wedges. Not sure is that is a typo on the menu or a stock issue as their collard greens were also out of stock that day. Wouldn’t care to visit again.

name: Justin Williams
text: Went Friday night, the place had a nice crowd. Sat at the bar and ordered right away. Bartender was very nice and talkative. Food was great! Need to cook the potato wedges just a hair longer though. Will definitely be back to try the wings another day.

name: Nick Pearson
text: Best Chicken you can get in Trussville. I have eaten in twice and done Take-Out twice. Never had a bad experience and food always tastes amazing. The portions are huge and prices are just right! If you haven't tried it yet I suggest you do so!

name: Linsey Honeycutt
text: My husband and I went to Yard Birds today to try the "bottomless chicken and waffles " It was delicious! The service was great and The chicken was freshly fried and hot when delivered. He ordered the original waffle. I ordered the chocolate chip waffle. Huge portions! No way we could do seconds! We had get a to go box for our first round!! We also ordered a bourbon pecan pie to go. We have not tried it yet, but it's beautiful in its box and smells amazing! We will be back!!!

name: Katy Gibson
text: Stopped in for the weekend brunch of ENDLESS chicken n waffles ($10 each), So good! The staff was friendly and helpful. Try it you'll love it. Plus the restaurant donates a part of their profits to military and first responders.

name: Peggy Cox
text: We visited the new Yard Birds Chicken in Trussville last evening. Very nice experience. Very clean, very friendly and very good food. Prices are reasonable and service is excellent. A nice, relaxing dinner. Absolutely the best Mac and cheese I've ever had!

name: Joanna Nicholas
text: We decided to try this place again a few nights ago. I got the bourbon Sriracha popcorn chicken. It was amazing and there was more than enough for leftovers. I ate it again the next day and it was even better. We ate there again today & it was wonderful again. Service was nice and quick. I'm so glad this place worked out it's growing pains & had turned into a decent place to have lunch or dinner.

name: K Mixon
text: It was just okay.  I got the smoked chicken and it had no flavor.  The grits were extremely runny and the collard greens were not good.  The macaroni and cheese had an unique taste that my daughter did not like.  I would have given this place one star but the severs were so nice and extremely helpful.

name: Anthony Riley
text: The food was great, it deserves five stars. The service was ok, it did take a little while for our order but it wasn't too long. The only drawback for me were the prices which I thought were a little high. I will have to try here again in the near future, the food was worth the trip.

name: Mary Libb
text: Just had the best fried chicken, fried green tomatoes and homemade pimento cheese at Yardbirds. The atmosphere, servers and music were also great. Will definitely be back soon!!

name: Lauren Washington
text: First time here, service started out a little slow, but our server Alexis made up for that, she was very friendly and provided great service. I really would like to give this place 3.5 starts just because it's not quite 4. Chicken was fried well, and breast was juicy and not dry, the crust had great flavor but the meat itself didn't have much flavor, chicken should be marinated or brined to give the meat some flavor. Whole fried okra was very good. Macaroni cheese was soupy with hardly any cheese flavor, they should revamp that recipe, collard greens were like they had been sitting all day they were over cooked. My family liked the waffles. I would give it another try to try some of the other sides. I think with a few changes this place would be a go to place.

name: Halen Talley
text: Very good. I think this would be a good place to come on a Football Saturday.

name: Neal Morrow
text: Chicken was cold and tasteless. Mac and cheese was not good but did enjoy the fried green tomatoes. Also, they forgot the cornbread/buscuit.

name: Landon K
text: I had mac & cheese, fruit bowl, and 8 pc wings. It was all really good and the wings are really big.

name: Tonja Johnson
text: It was 15.00 for a small cup of Mac & Cheese, 4 small potatoe wedges and popcorn chicken. The popcorn chicken was mostly crumbs, all of the food was overcooked, and cold. Will not return

name: katie woodall
text: Great food and service!!!! We will be back for.  Chicken and waffles

name: Corey Morris
text: Came in the afternoon and no one here and still has taken them 20 + mins to bring my wings. They were no servers in sight when we entered it took at least 5 mins before they came out from the back

name: cporourke
text: Great food! Better service!

name: Neoami S
text: I did not like this place.  Chicken was done and tasted ok.  Sides (macaroni and potato salad) were the worst I've ever eaten. Cornbread was hard and horrible.  Will not be back.

name: Terrell Glass
text: Great chicken. It's a little expensive but it's worth it!

name: WatersEdge07
text: The chicken is great, and the sauce goes well with it.  My dad loved the BBQ beans, too.

name: Amy Latta
text: We stopped here on our way to FL. The chicken is amazing! It has a crunchy breading with a sauce that's sweet and tangy. The prices are reasonable, too. Drive past the fast food and come here instead.

name: Jasmine
text: This little place was suggested by a friend and we got the delicious chicken we'd been told we would find! Limited seating & you'll eat off paper plates. But that adds to the fun.

name: James Barton
text: A little hole in the wall serving the best fried chicken in South Alabama (and probably farther). Great value for the money, too. The building is old and sorely in need of a refurb, but that doesn't detract from the great food.

name: Christopher Dean
text: The most over rated chicken you will ever taste. Poor cleanliness, bland chicken seasoning, fries are a soft mush, and employees have no customer service skills. This place is all hype. At least the food is relatively cheap.

name: Jurethia Madison
text: This is the best chicken in central Alabama!! And not to mention the special sauce. The score is up (high 90s) as of 1/7/17. Visiting this place is a must when I come through Troy.

name: Possum jelly
text: It's the same thing as R&R fish and ribs. A greasy spoon diner. The same guy runs both places. Used to be great when it was on 231

name: Carl Parnell, Jr.
text: The food was good and the people are very nice. Remember to ask for their special sauce.

name: David Wilkins
text: Great chicken ( and livers if that's what you like ). Be sure to get extra Crowe's sauce, because it's good!

name: Levi Villars
text: Best damn chicken I've ever had in my life.

name: Robert Watson
text: Small snack with an extra sause is the way to go. Place received national recognition for its chicken fingers back on the 80s.

name: Michele Simon
text:
Visiting here from Florida and I ABSOLUTELY PROMISE YOU, this is the BEST Fried chicken I have had since I was a little girl back in the 60's. OMG!!!!!!
Definitely have to take some of this back home with me. THANK YOU!!!!!!

name: Saundra Moore
text: Best chicken tenders in Troy... Building can use a little rennovating

name: Tony Fortune
text: The best chicken you will ever eat.

name: Dwight Crews
text: Good food but the restaurant is a little dirty.

name: darlene sims
text: Best chicken ever, we need a Crowe's Chicken in Dothan Alabama ASAP

name: Darren Roberson
text: Great food and price

name: Austin and Britney Parker
text: Good value and flavor

name: Roycelyn Goodwin
text: Food is bland... no seasoning on chicken,fries or mash potatoes

name: Irby Pace
text: Cockroaches.... everywhere. Don't go.

name: evannporter
text: Always make a pit stop when traveling thru!!!  Yum!!! Just the same as when I was at Troy State 😁😁😁😁😁😁

name: Jason Scott
text: Don't remember

text: Just not good!

text: This location is no longer a Sonic. It's now called Route 63 Stop, and the food was delicious!!

text: NOT A SONIC! Food is still pretty good but if you were wanting slushes and other sonic treats you won’t find em here

text: I didn't hate it.I hated the one in Alex. city closed!

name: Jeffery Cleckler
text: This is definitely the slowest service I've ever had at ANY Sonic I've ever been to! I waited at the drive though sign for 15 minutes, then decide the park in a stall, pushed the little red button waited another 10 minutes and decided it wasnt worth the wait. I could only imagine how long it would've taken if I ever did submit my order.

name: Justin Clayton
text: Oh boy..  where to begin..  easily in the top 2 or 3 of worst fast food restaurants I've been to.  I've literally went three times in a row, and something was messed up with my order or they were out of something. I have been once since the fiascos, and I had an overly nice waiter and the food was perfect.  However, more times than not this Sonic is a pass for us.

name: Jon Heath
text: The service sucks. My wife and I waited 15 minutes for 2 milk shakes that were melted by time we got them. Not to mention we paid 13 dollars for the damn things. I'll never go back to a Sonic.

name: Mary Davis
text: I ordered a cup of ice ad some pickle o's Casia was out with in 5min. With a smile. Love it

name: Chase Kriens
text: My wife left me last night, and all I wanted to do was eat some chese tots. My van was nearly broken and they gave me a million dollars.

name: Stefanie Whitley
text: This place is so slow. Never been anywhere this slow. Horrible service!!!! After I sat for 20 mins for 2 molten cake sundaes they came and told me they were out of cakes. 20 mins to come tell me that! This place is ridiculous

name: Akita Adamson
text: Unprofessional workers. All kids work here. It takes 2-3 hours just to get your food. Once order is received its either wrong or old fries. I don't understand how every other sonics has improved but not the one in alexander city.

name: Bk Nolen
text: Very, very, very slow.  Definitely not a fast food drive in!

name: Robert Jackson
text: Soooo slow; having worked at a Sonic for >6 years the routine is supposed to be made in ~2 minutes and @ customer by 4.  Have spent 20 minutes waiting on 2 regular combos during slow hours.

name: Fred Bazinski
text: I have been to Sonics in six different states and this is by far the worst one. Takes FOREVER to get your food, and very rarely is it right. Today I ordered cheese tots and got a chili dog. How the hell do you screw up an order for cheese tots???!!!

name: doublen7784
text: Waited over an hour, then order was wrong. Understaffed to say the least.

name: ITod 5
text:
It's closed now , you can put together why

Ordered a burger on Tuesday , felt like Friday before I got it

name: Brandon Keel
text: Waited in line for 30 mins for 2 slushes!!! Ridiculous!!!!

name: Brooke Davis
text: Good,but slow service

name: Jessica Gunter
text: Hit or miss with customer service, some are amazing, some stink.

name: Tyler McNeill
text: this place sucks everybody is inside playing on phones not taken orders doing everything but work it's very trashy smells awful be ready to wait a hour or longer for a simple drink order then after you wait they say there out of that product it's a disgrace!!!!!!!!!😠

name: Terry Bright
text: Slow and a the burger and tots were a little bit cold.

name: Nathan Hammond
text: It takes forever to get your food here!

name: Juan Carrion
text: Food  sucks, service too

text: Horrible....always slow...we have left before because they would not bring good. Tonight they would not even answer the order button... We left again.

name: willie garrett

name: Kathy Graham
text: Because of Ms Patricia  kindness and professionalism toward me ans the fact that the food was hot and delicious, I give this KFC on College Ave in Jackson Ala. a 5 star review. I was having problem with  the online app and I walk over an she went out of way to serve me . She made me feel valuable  and which was very uplifting from what I was going thru in the moment.

name: Cynthia Dean
text: Food was good employees were nice

name: L&L Carpenter
text:
Horrible service and not so great chicken. Waited in drive thru for over 20 mins. before we ordered (only 1 car ahead, waiting). Ask for a chicken sandwich for myself and was informed they did not have the chicken for the sandwich but, could make me one with chicken strips (ok) and fries,  order for my husband as well 3 pc dinner, white, extra crispy, with mash potatoes and coleslaw. Waited forever again for food and to pay. Paid, then received box in a bag no sandwich or fries, ask the lady about mine, her response was I thought that was the car behind you, Paid again (sandwich and fries not on receipt). Get down the road hubby has no coleslaw... NOT going back!
Needless to say we will not be visiting this KFC again. We travel a lot due to his work and have eaten at many, many KFC, this is one of the worse by far.

name: Justine Page
text: Very good food, fast and friendly employees

name: Jackie Williams
text:
In fear of ordering because last time the chicken was old and hard.
After going and ordering the chicken and I feared right this chicken is hard and terrible

name: Bob Barker
text: Waited in line to get food only to find out they don’t accept American Express! Will not return!

name: Chuck Brock
text: Great food fast service

name: Felisha Renner
text: Good chicken and great service!!

name: Andrew Ashley
text: One of the ladies called me a liar because she said thay she put my sides that I was supposed to have in the bag and they weren't there. Food was terrible. Never going back!

name: Amanda Craft
text: Always stop at this Shell Quickmart on my way out of town.  Food is always good and friendly service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review!!

text: First time I ate there the lemon pepper wings were great. But they have lost their standards. Today I. Ordered chicken that was refried & I'm sure it was day old chicken and the lemon pepper chicken wings tasted rotten. I will not be returning.

name: Moshe Yisrael
text: I like their spicy chicken sandwich. They have fast service

name: sam silverman
text: Made the mistake of eating here today. The absolute worst Fried Chicken I've ever put in my mouth! I'm pretty sure it was yesterday's batch that was left over and refried. Couldn't finish it.

text: I always order the Gyro sandwich or salad. My food is always good and fresh!

name: Malika Fortier
text: I really like their fish sub!  Good good.

name: James Galyon
text: I must agree this used to be really great but now. It's not I have darkened the door for the last time.refried chicken and probably refried fries

name: Shaquille Bryant
text: They have the best lemon pepper chicken around.

name: Trebor J. Dukes
text: Good food and fast service

name: asdf
text: Awesome food. Get your ass there now.

name: John Ford
text: I love their chicken

text: When you order a 10 pieces of wings they be small not average size

text: Says it opens at 10 but it wasn't open when I came.

text: Shrimps tasted old.

name: Susan Bridges
text: Freshly cooked...

text: When u order just chicken they charge you for a whole meal

name: cedric brown
text: Try the Lemon Pepper wings.

name: Derrick Seay
text: Just ok

name: Nikki Pettway
text: Good

name: Sky Whiddon
text: Pulled off the road after a stressful drive (if you can even call it that it was more like a stroll) through a bad accident on I-85. Me and my family were all very pleased with the service. The cashier was friendly, the food was hot, and the service was was great. I highly recommend this location

name: Asia Miller
text: Did not buy anything. They said the system was down. I called later and they said they did not have containers to even sell anything so they were not selling any items at the moment. The guy said "hello" when he answered the phone instead of "Popeyes". They all need training and new management at this location. They need a new computer system. I will not stop here again. I feel that they will not be able to serve me.

name: Douglas Young
text: Would give 0 stars if able.  Sat at drive thru kiosk for several minutes and nobody responded.  Drove to window and were told drive-thru mike is broken.  Also told they were  out of chicken patties and out of Diet Coke. Completely “don’t give a sh*t” staff.  Don’t give this place your business.  They probably don’t have anything to sell you anyway.

name: Lawrence Henderson
text: They are located next to a Love's truck stop. I am a trucker. They allow drive through only. They won't serve you if you walk up to the window. Personnel were very rude. They lost a lot of walk up trucker's while I was there. Told us to go to Burger King next store, that they allowed walk ups at drive through window. Incredibly insane. Lots of lost revenue.

name: swiss faction
text: Horribly rude service. I didn't even order. I pulled up to the window and the girl was singing a rap song with obscene lyrics, and when I asked to order, then she said "you are welcome to come inside." I replied, "is the drive through not open?" And she responded with a "ratchet" attitude. Stating pointedly, "AS I SAID..." then I just drove away. You want to fight for 15/h then act like that? You people are ridiculous.

name: daniel ramirez
text: There's always something wrong in that restaurant, different times, often they don't have what is in the menu, the sweet tea is not sweet, this last time, they took 20 min to make the complete the order, fries were cold, no spicy chicken. This guys put Popeyes name in a bad way! Always something wrong!!

name: Nickie Capps
text:
They were fabulous today (11/20/20 130 pm). Both sandwiches were huge, hot, fresh, as well as came out quickly.

We have continued to get great service and hot food since. Poor guy was basically running the place himself and still moved the line in a timely manner with correct food.

name: Mark Kuehndorf
text: Quick service for drive-thru chicken; my order was accurate; food was delicious.

name: Augusta Bryant
text: Food was cold not even warm. Plus I had to wait over 20 minutes for a simple order. I will not be going back. Service was lazy. 😕👎

name: Fugeta20
text: Great Performance, made my morning. Thank you.

name: Lynn Stauch
text: Delicious food but service is on again and off again. You never know which you will get.

name: mugo ngunda
text: Bad food bad service popeyes should get on this place like serously. This site deserves to be shut down

name: Vee D
text: The absolutely most disrespectful service that I have ever witnessed in my life. Pulled up at the window at 8:40 absolutely no food as the sever was sooooooo rude beyond rude as we pulled to the window she was worse than trying to ordering at the speaker. I love popeyes but this was the worse experience ever. Popeyes Shorter Al  2/19/21

name: Mark Haag
text: From ordering to getting our food was a disaster. We had to repeat everything 3-5 times.  We had her repeat which we thought was right. After getting receipt it was incorrect and she had the audacity to tell us she repeated it back to us already. DO NOT STOP HERE

name: Kenya Williams
text: ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTING!!! Worst service I’ve ever seen in any restaurant. Member slammed the door in my face , and it took every fiber of my being not to attack her. The employees really should be fired; there behavior could potentially get them hurt.

name: Curtis Pearsall
text:
Wow!!!  Not in a good way either.   4:30pm on Friday and doesn't have any Chicken ready?

Asked for 12 pc and they refused because they only had a 9 pc special?

Seriously???

Who trains these people?

Just keep driving folks

name: Latifah Starks
text: Slow slow slow most times nothing you ask for they have and staff super unprofessional

name: Anthony Solomon
text: Closed before the time advertised. This place is a joke like most Frenchies in the country South. The worst place you can end up.

name: Kelly McGee
text: The workers were nice and the spicy chicken sandwiches and chicken tenders were good, but something was terribly wrong with the biscuit I almost gave to my 2 year old. My husband took a nibble and said it was salty, so I took a huge bite and it tasted strongly of cleaning chemicals. At first like hand soap, but then burned like something much stronger. This should not happen, ever!!

name: KIRBY CLEMENTS
text: One car at the drive up ordering section, so it seemed promising.  I was wrong.  After several minutes of silence from Popeyes, the person in the lead car started calling out, "Hello".  No one answered.  The third car that had pulled in behind us, after we had been there a bit, finally drove off.  We also left.  As we drove around, there were two or three cars waiting near the window. One was past the window as if waiting on a part of their order. In another car, a convertable, the occupants were literally sunning themselves.  I looked in the store and saw folks and someone who appeared to be the manager standing around.  Given that I am a fried chicken junkie, you have to know that I waited a good bit, and it hurt to b leave as I really wanted fried chicken.  Won't stop there again.

name: Madison Yarn
text: The ugly skinny lady at the window had a bad attitude at the window, me and my mom let it go and pulled up to window. She damn near threw my drink out the window and dropped our card on the ground. Very unprofessional and I won’t be back.

name: Kim Wimberly
text: The supervisor a black older lady was nice nasty because I questioned why my dad was paying $9.17 for a 2pc chicken and 2 sides.  She refused to wait on me and asked a nicer younger lady to take my order.  I wished I could of rated the service a zero, however it wouldn’t allow me to leave a comment unless I highlighted a star.  Then my mother said as she was walking out, she heard the supervisor talking about me to a customer.  How is she the manager?  Popeye needs to hire individuals with customer service experience.  Maybe she needs management training, customer service training, among other trainings.

name: Irene Adler
text:
I was told I can’t have a chicken sandwich without the mayonnaise (or sauce). “Because the chicken sandwiches are pre-made, as advertised”.. I didn’t make that quote up. The manager, literally, told me the sandwiches are pre-made.
The implication being - the sandwiches are made with mayonnaise and are sat in an area where they are kept warm.. That is absolutely disgusting!

name: Joey Sgarlata
text: No friggin reason to have to pay $7 for french fries... 🍟

name: Erin Engelbracht
text: Would give 0 stars if I could. Worst Popeyes on earth

name: Deborah Walker
text: Horrible  we waited  in the drive thru not knowing  they were closed at 812 went to the window  no one address  us  this place needs new management  will never  come again to that location

name: Shelia Jennings
text: My chicken  was old.I didn't  get all my food. I was very  upset. My friend  didn't want to go back.

name: Rodney gream
text: Got there at 5pm. Food must have been left from lunch. Cold hard fries. Chicken dried out from being on warmer for hours. Worst popeye’s I have ever eaten at. Wished I had read reviews before going there. Would have given a zero if possible.

name: Iris Stewart
text: The people at this popeyes was very nice. There service was excellent. The food was great if I travel back that way I will stop there. I highly recommend this popeyes

text: The best of the best. The top gun of chicken.

name: Shateria Lewis
text: Horrible! Need to closed down and everybody on night shift should be fired! We were told, at the drive thru, they were out of chicken, and we heard the workers in the background laughing. We’re traveling and need to get food and they’re playing!

name: Tina Nelson
text: The rip N chicken was hard as a brick and all the employees wanted to do is talk to each other

name: Jimiria Kitt-Wilson
text: Very poor service. Every night we're always greeted with a before you order we only have popcorn shrimp, a few sides and a few biscuits 😔😔 and this is before 9:30 and they close at 10pm. Get home and they still forgot the biscuits!!😡

name: Mark Bowden
text: Hands down, without a doubt the slowest "fast" food restaurant I have ever been to. Never again.

name: Goldie Weber
text: I can't believe this place is still in business, if there not out of one thing or the other they are giving you whatever they want you to have.  I say if your going to disregard my order and give me what you want me to eat then you pay for it.

name: R0cK GoD
text: Extremely friendly. Fast and accurate service. Overall great chicken at a fair price. Better than the truck stop food if your in the area.

name: Paige J
text: When going through the drive through we were unable to finish our order. The lady taking our order told us to pull around. We assumed something might have been wrong with the headset. When we got to the window to try to finish our order she told us that they didn’t take add ons to orders. The woman finally agreed and we told her we needed a regular chicken sandwich. She yelled to the kitchen that she needed another spicy chicken sandwich.....the fries were good. Lol

name: Hannah Johnson
text: Three visits to this location and they always get the sides wrong. You have to wait 20+ minutes for your food and they will not apologize. I also would not recommend paying in cash because they refused to make correct change and stole $5 from me.

name: Dusty Shirley
text: System down at 12:30pm

name: Tanya Taylor
text: Ordered blackened tenders which are on the menu and got to the window and didn’t get what I ordered said they don’t make them... uhm then take it off your menu and don’t try substituting my order without asking.

Then I heard her talking about another customer in drive thru over the speaker because she wasn't aware her mic was still on. Then you had to wait another 15 minutes before the chicken would be ready! After all that they didn't have my order right!

I still don't have my food and it's been over an hour. 3 cars behind me have now received there food ahead of me.  We were asked to pull up and weight. So I can't pull off because its been paid for. Like the previous comments before me DON'T COME HERE!!!GO TO ANOTHER POPEYS. NEVER AGAIN

name: Adrian Richard
text: When it's fresh hot good and on time, home run baby home run.

text: KEEP GOING, go on to another stop! Poor service, attitude was bad felt like we were being rushed. Tried to order numerous things but they weren't ready, wait of 10 min or more.

text: The restaurant in shorter Alabama has the worst service and rudess employees in the world.  I can't help life threw them a curve ball.

name: KIM MOWERY
text:
The fried chicken on the bone is so good that I'd probably still eat it even if it had feathers on it.
It wasn't greasy, the crust was crunchy and the flavor was awesome.

name: C Fincher
text: Unbelievably sorry service, didn’t get me the drink but ask me to pull forward and wait. Brought out the wrong order and no drink three times while taking 10 minutes between times. The dining room was closed so not extremely busy.

name: Ally Snyder
text: Employees are very rude. They kept talking over me and were very pushy and mean. Didn't tell us their card reader was down until we were at the window.

text: Excellent food, friendly service but some of the dining tables were not clean.

name: Angela Essien

name: Tiffany Crawford
text: TERRIBLE service. I always order the same thing, sandwich with no mayo.  She proceeded to tell me they are pre-made. I told her I always order that way and all she said was ITS PRE-MADE much louder and ruder. Lazy is what they are! I will call corporate tomorrow. Looks like you are known for being so rude by your reviews.

name: Vivian Simmons
text: "Love that chicken from popeye's" .This is exit 22 off I-85 Shorter . Also a Love's McDonald's, subway and nearby burger king, and Charley's philly cheesesteak restaurant.

text: The worst place ever. Just go ahead and shut down. Waste of time sitting in the drive thru (only 1 car ahead of me and nobody tried to take my order for over 10min) only to be told I couldn’t have an order without pickles because it was pre-made.

text: The old hag of a manager told me i couldn’t get a refund for the dry chicken they gave me. Then she argued about what money I’m suppose to get back saying i can just get some more chicken when i get off work or tomorrow. She was  very raggedy and rude. Finally got my refund

I did not order the new chicken sandwich so it shouldn't have been a problem filling my order quicker.  First and last time there.

text: After 15 min waiting time they asked what we ordered. No receipts were given out to any customers. No apologies. No napkins provided.  Costumer "service" foreign word there.

text: Awesome customer service. Fast and courteous customer service. Hot fresh food.

text: The drive thru lady on Dec 21st at 1:40 pm was Extremely Rude!! Pulled up in Drive Thru and told them that we are looking at the menu to decide what we would like. She didn’t respond. In less than 10 seconds says can I take your order again as if she was rushing us. We stated again that we were looking at the menu. Some guy comes up on the speaker asking something and she respond Idk in the headset in such an unprofessional way as if to say she doesn’t know what we want and we need to hurry. We ordered and I Just can’t explain the low level of customer service that we experienced. This place should be shut down. If you don’t like your job, leave instead of messing up others people day. Customer service is not for everyone. Popeyes you should be ashamed. I don’t expect Chic Fil A’s level of customer service but I am a Human being and would appreciate respect! We left and did not even eat!

text: Came for a spicy chicken sandwich at noon. Asked for one with No pickles. Cashier said they couldn't do that because they already had them made with pickles and they weren't making any more right now. Then proceeded to give me a cold sandwich with pickles.  Worst experience I've had with Popeyes OR AAFES.

name: Joshua Rosekrans
text: A couple of the employees there have terrible attitudes. My wife and I are regulars and we usually use a deal from the app. These 2 employees in particular give us attitude for using it because their system apparently doesn't allow them to just put in the codes from the deals. Well one day my wife and I go there and they immediately start saying to one another "Aw no, you'll have to take them. I can't deal with them." Not even trying to make sure we didn't hear them or anything. They have no sense of customer service and always act like they hate their jobs.

name: Jason Bradwell
text: Always great service and friendly atmosphere. The Buffalo chicken salad is the best salad I have had in a long while. They will make your chicken as hot as you want it. Great place to watch any sporting event. My new favorite in Mobile.

name: C J
text: Good food and not to bad of service

name: Jessica Harper
text: The worst experience with a restaurant EVER! When I first come in on my lunch to pick up a call in order there was a young girl that was openly was discussing that she would rather serve dogs than children as they were discussing family night. Someone that PAYS their hard earned money to come in and eat with their children I was instantly disgusted. Then I get back to work and find that my food was undercooked (still bleeding) when I asked for well done. The gentleman that was the manager condoned her remarks as she is just young. Well sir my young children come in there to eat and I am utterly applaud that you stand behind her remarks. I will never spend my money at this restaurant simply because of the manager and the way he handled this situation. So I missed my lunch and had to do without. THANK YOU! Word of mouth is the best compliment, to bad you left me with only negativity.

name: Sam Shorrosh
text: Love the personal visits by the owner who always takes a minute to talk table side. The food is always piping hot and the drinks ice cold. Lots of TVs all around to entertain and the wait staff are helpful without hovering.

name: Cindy Golliher
text: Best wings I have ever had!! Great atmosphere.  Great service. I will definitely stop here the next time I'm in town!

name: Nik Gribb
text: Absolutely the worst service. We decided to go there for some Southern Style food and came away disgusted.  We ordered the fried green tomatoes as an appetizer, got them AFTER our main course was eaten.  Server continually blamed the kitchen staff for the half and hour wait.  The restaurant wasn't even packed.  We ordered corn dogs for the kids, yup half and hour wait.  Server completely forgot the diet coke and screwed up the chicken order.  We asked for legs and thighs, got beast and wing. Argggh.

name: Vernetta Ervin
text: I love this place their wings and loaded fries are the bomb. We also watch the games on one of the many different TV screens they have throughout the place. Great place for sport fans to gather.

name: Shawn Dunne
text: Really good food. I had the jerk wings! Drinks were fine. Beer selection was lacking in the darker Porter style range. The big projectors didn't have great color or clear pictures in the bar area. Overall the pretty decent place.

name: nate J. pooh
text: At the start the service was questionable. We're getting seated and the first table she wanted to seat us at was directly in front on entry way of kitchen. Second spot  was directly next to a couple. Mind you the place was very unpacked maybe 10 guest at best 5 of 10 were at the bar when we got there. The table  had not been wiped clean. The whole area had not been clean since whoever left. It was so slow that the associates were  just standing around talking . The bathroom  looked like a club bathroom on a Saturday night at 2am. Floors were very sticky for some reason. Like when you go to a club and its really hot  and people have wasted alcohol and it's been trampled on. NOW the food was good but the chicken strips and 2 sides was very over price at $13! Three strips fries  and a small  dish  salad. Strips and fries were good tho. I got the Nashville Hot Chicken with two sides.  That was a whole chicken breast and wing for $10 and change. It was very good. Now our waitress was a different story. She was unenthusiastic and very dry. We had completely  ate our food but she had the nerve to ask if we wanted to-go boxes. Um... for the crumbles of curly fries ??? She also didn't check on us till after  we were 80% done eating.

name: Derek Jones
text: Cool venue with plenty of 📺 for whichever sport you prefer. The new Nashville got spice chicken menu is delicious!

name: Maryah Payton
text: I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!!! Been going here since I was younger and my favorite are the gooey fries and honey bbq wings! Fast service, good food, nice environment!

name: Michael
text: Meh....I walked in right to place a to-go order for a Nashville hot chicken platter as they were opening for the day. I was told that they didn't have any chicken halves so I had to get the tenders. I took a seat at the end of the bar to wait on my food. The bartender (a very petite brunette) never acknowledged my presence. I would have had a cold beer while I waited to no avail, she was too preoccupied with her cellphone which she had hooked up charging next to the register. (Who shows up for work at 11am and has to charge their phone?) I suppose I may return one day due to the chicken being pretty good but that bartender should understand her personal phone takes a back seat to anyone who sits at the bar. I'm sure she saw me it would have been impossible to miss me. Everyone else was fairly pleasent. Took off 2 stars for not having what I wanted and the unattentive bar keep on duty that day.

name: Sasha Thatcher
text: The service was good and the staff was friendly.  We didn't have to wait long for our food.

name: Taylor Stine
text:
As a personal employee I am sad to do this.
My first week i was forced to work doubles back to back and to the point I had to bring my kids to work while I was working because my own boss did not care. It was that bad. They personally do not care for anyone below upper management. The OWNER! even said to me himself that if my family is falling apart because I work doubles then the restaurant business is not for me. I've been in this business 6 years. Without us employees he wouldn't have a restaurant. That was rude of him. Honestly worst place ever to work. I'll be calling the health department and more very soon.

Also the young man had a mask on, until he spoke to the customers. Then he moved it down below his chin to speak. We about to leave the food and not pay.
